title: Gift Package
desc: This ought to be a secret, but Coding Ninjas offers you T-Shirts, Notebook, Wildcraft Bagpack, Laptop stickers, and other little things that would aid your learning here with home delivery.

title: Teaching Assistant Internship (TAship)
desc: After completing 80% of the course, you can apply for TAship. Duration of TAship will be 4 months and has stipend upto â‚¹30,000.

title: More Discounts On Courses
desc: As a student who already applied this coupon and passed through a course, you're entitled to a 10% Discount on your next course.

title: Premium Hirist Account
desc: Get 6 months Premium account on Hirist. Showcase your skills on Hirist, And then Apply for Internships and Jobs.

title: Become Campus Ninja's
desc: Organize hackathons, Assist Coding Ninjas Team to organize Talks/Sessions , Introduce Coding Ninjas to your college and get exciting prizes.
